LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldLite.label: neko shield lite
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldLite.description: A projectile-repulsion device. It will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, alse against melee attacks or heat.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldLite.verbs.0.label: pop smoke
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldPro.label: neko shield pro
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldPro.description: A projectile-repulsion device. It will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, alse against melee attacks or heat.\n\nIt could be upgraded by using energe cube and neko core.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldPro.verbs.0.label: force active
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoShieldPro.verbs.1.label: launch rail gun shell
